issue.title: [Rust] [Large]BinaryArray can be created from non-binary datatypes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10394](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10394). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the same way StringArray has a dedicated offsetsize with the corresponding datatype, we can do that for BinaryArray to validate the type.
